Are the shops a 1 time only or does 5 different skins come up after.

My discounts were actually pretty. Got 3 team skins (SSW rengar and talon, SKT Zed) plus Void Noc.
All in all, I'm really happy with the sales I got, they're all for champs I really enjoy playing.
And now, thanks to having SKT Zed on sale, I've got all the skins for him!! :DDD

Thx Riot

This bot doesn't seem to be smart. I own three Veigar skins, (Including Final Boss) and it gives me 70% on Leprechaun. 
I own 3 Ezreal skins, (Striker, Explorer and TPA) and it gives me a 40% discount on frosted...
The others were Infernal Alistar (I have Unchained and Matador)
Pool Party Rek'sai (I have eternum T_T)
and Academy Ekko (Level 5 ekko with sandstorm)
So much for "Smart Bot" lmao
